dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 9153 IH: Trucking Workforce Improvement Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Good of Virginia (for himself, Mr. Cloud, Mrs. Miller of Illinois, Mr. Wittman, Mr. Roy, and Mr. Rosendale) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

form.official-title: To repeal the Federal Motor Carrier Safety Administrationâ€™s rule titled Minimum Training Requirements for Entry-Level Commercial Motor Vehicle Operators.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Trucking Workforce Improvement Act.

The final rule issued by the Federal Motor Carrier Safety Administration titled Minimum Training Requirements for Entry-Level Commercial Motor Vehicle Operators issued on December 8, 2016 (81 Fed. Reg. 88732) shall have no force or effect.
